summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 STARCRAFT ALLSTAR TRANSIT BUS. THE CONTACT DISCOVERED THAT THE CROSSBEAM BEHIND THE REAR WHEELS WAS CORRODED AND DETERIORATING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE PASSENGER SIDE CABIN NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 84,929.
